name: Insect Invitation
text: Face-up monsters your opponent controls that were not Summoned this turn become Insect. You can only use each of the following effects of "Insect Invitation" once per turn. You can target 3 of your banished Insect monsters; shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 1 card. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was sent there from the hand this turn: You can place this card face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone.
